resources.string: The country code %d is wrong!
Cannot get the country code!
Hey there, no Internet connection detected. Sorry but you won\'t be able sign up/login with us. Please try again later.
We are not able to reach pfingo server.\n Please note that minutes and credit balance displayed may not be up-to-date.
Hey there, mobile number format provided does not match our database.\n Mind giving us the correct number?
I see what you did there.\n To use pfingo,we need your mobile number to begin with.
While we would love to extend pfingo service to all, there are certain countries which are currently not supported.\n Stay tune and it will be available in our future releases.
We are not able to generate an OTP for the time being. \n Reference:%s
We are not able to generate an OTP for the time being.\n Please try again later.
We are not able to verify the OTP.\n Reference %s
We are not able to verify the OTP.\n Please try again later.
User Registration Unsuccessful.\n Please try again.
User Registration Timeout.\n Please try again.
Hey there, no Internet connection detected.\n Please note that we may not be able to help you make any calls.
We are not able to reach pfingo server.\n Please note that we may not be able to help you make any calls.
Press [Back] again to exit pfingo.
We are not able to connect your call at this moment.\n Please try again later.
No Records.
I see what you did there.\n To make a call, tap on contacts on your contact list or dial the number from the dialpad.
The debuger mode is started!
